etomica.data.meter

Class MeterPressureMolecular

  • java.lang.Object
    • etomica.data.DataSourceScalar
      • etomica.data.meter.MeterPressureMolecular
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IDataSource, IEtomicaDataSource

    public class MeterPressureMolecular
extends DataSourceScalar
    Meter for evaluation of the soft-potential (molecular) pressure in a box. Requires that temperature be set in order to calculation ideal-gas contribution to pressure; default is to use zero temperature, which causes this contribution to be omitted.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class etomica.data.DataSourceScalar

        data, dataInfo, tag

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      double getDataAsScalar()
      Computes total pressure in box by summing virial over all pairs, and adding ideal-gas contribution.

      Returns the integrator associated with this instance.
      boolean isIncludeLrc()
      Indicates whether calculated energy should include long-range correction for potential truncation (true) or not (false).

      Sets flag indicating whether calculated energy should include long-range correction for potential truncation (true) or not (false).

    • Constructor Detail

      • MeterPressureMolecular

        public MeterPressureMolecular(ISpace space)

    • Method Detail

      • setIntegrator

        public void setIntegrator(IntegratorBox newIntegrator)
        Sets the integrator associated with this instance. The pressure is calculated for the box the integrator acts on and integrator's temperature is used for the ideal gas contribution.

      • getIntegrator

        public IntegratorBox getIntegrator()
        Returns the integrator associated with this instance. The pressure is calculated for the box the integrator acts on and integrator's temperature is used for the ideal gas contribution.

      • setIncludeLrc

        public void setIncludeLrc(boolean b)
        Sets flag indicating whether calculated energy should include long-range correction for potential truncation (true) or not (false).

      • isIncludeLrc

        public boolean isIncludeLrc()
        Indicates whether calculated energy should include long-range correction for potential truncation (true) or not (false).

      • getDataAsScalar

        public double getDataAsScalar()
        Computes total pressure in box by summing virial over all pairs, and adding ideal-gas contribution.
        Specified by:
        getDataAsScalar in class DataSourceScalar
